extendedInfo.description: ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLYPacked with over 1000 questions with detailed answers, Upward Mobilityâs high-value CompTIA Super Bundle app is designed to escort you to the level of an advanced CompTIA network technician.Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.This bundle contains our exclusive exam prep material for the CompTIA 220-801 (A+ Essentials), 220-802 (A+ Practical Application), SY0-301 (Security+) and the N10-005 (Network+) exams, at a steep discount from purchasing them separately.In our modules, each expert-written question is paired with an explanatory answer and a Key Takeaway. The Key Takeaway is designed to reinforce core knowledge and support the answer with important insights on how to practically apply the knowledge in a real world situation so you can be more successful in your career.Our apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion in both an aggregate and a question-by-question format.This app is not affiliated with CompTIA.About Upward MobilityUpward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: Multiple choice questions, only allow users to select 1 answer. Forcing a wrong answer.   Please fix. I fail because of this problem.
reviews.author: William Singer

reviews.title: Outdated content
reviews.comment: I\'m on an author team that writes some of the A+ textbooks on the market, and I\'ve been comparing test prep programs lately. This one has a nice interface; I really like the Key Takeaway feature. The answer explanations are well done. But the content is severely outdated. Some of this content was dropped two exams ago (after the 600 series), and much of the content just hasn\'t kept up with technology (several years outdated). With content updates, could be a winner!
reviews.author: Jill West

reviews.title: Needs spell checked and revised
reviews.comment: Great content. I\'ve been waiting for awhile for the updated 8xx course. It does need some spell checking done. Wording was an issue on some questions also.  Would recommend adding some other study activities aside from just doing LONG practice tests.
reviews.author: Ian Lewis

reviews.title: Great until last update
reviews.comment: I enjoyed the knowledge gained from this bundle but ever since my last and only update a few weeks ago, all it does is crash every time I attempt to open a study or test session. I will gladly change my 2 stars to 5 once this issue is addressed and fixed.
reviews.author: Victor Sutphen III

reviews.title: Great study companion
reviews.comment: Overall good app. I haven\'t had any problems with it and it is helping me understand networking a lot better.
reviews.author: Tony Zepeda

reviews.title: Not as usefull as I expected
reviews.comment: Interface is dated to begin with. Many of the questions were taken from other testing applications. Looks like they took tests from others and just added them to their test engine. Will use a few more times but will probably ask for a refund.
reviews.author: Marc Shields

reviews.title: Awesome value
reviews.comment: You can\'t beat this app :-D
reviews.author: Jeremy Garcher

reviews.title: Helped me a lot
reviews.comment: Used it with other sources for my A+ now Im using it for my Network+. It has been a big help for my studies.
reviews.author: Garry Balewitz

reviews.title: Needs work.
reviews.comment: Far too many questions that require choosing more than one answer... But only have radial buttons so can only select one answer. These need to be switched to check box instead of radial button. Otherwise they are always counted as incorrect since you can only pick one answer.
reviews.author: Aaron Carrillo

reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months.
reviews.comment: Get the message that the\"app closed\"when I start study or test modes.
reviews.author: T Smith

reviews.title: Erroneous Info, practice tests need work
reviews.comment: This app is riddled with errors, typos, misspellings, and the practice tests ask for multiple answers but only give the option for one answer, so it gets marked as wrong. Still, there is a lot of useful info in it. I am uninstalling it and finding something better, though.
reviews.author: Eric Nelson

reviews.title: Great app, needs work.
reviews.comment: Needs some updating to keep up with current exams such as the N10-005 exam. Needs more questions. I\'ve only been concerned with the N+ part since that\'s what I\'m taking right now and some questions about the tools don\'t have pictures associated. Could have a randomized study guide.
reviews.author: John Murphy

reviews.title: Good, Needs Improvement
reviews.comment: The questions are Always in the same order so that if you leave the app you have to answer the same questions again and again before your get to questions you haven\'t seen yet. There is no way to skip to new questions within the module, either.  It would be ah Great app if the dev (1) enabled randomized questions within the modules, (2) the app remembered your progress and (3) the app was made more stable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but needs improvement.
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing. Would be way better if we had the options to save. I don\'t like that it has 20 different versions of the sane test, just with the questions in different orders. I figured it would be different tests for each section.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent study tool
reviews.comment: Big factor with helping me pass the CompTIA A+ Certification test
reviews.author: Herb Reyes

reviews.title: Please Update
reviews.comment: Please update this app to coincide with current industry standards, then you will get 5 stars. I paid for this, at least you could oblige.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Vzw G Nex
reviews.comment: I had a few issues when I 1st got this for my Nexus, but an email to the dev was handled quickly and courteously.  The content appears to be of good quality and thorough on the topics.  A steal really when you consider how much information is there.  Ted was extremely helpful at getting my issue resolved...These are type of developers you should be supporting!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Only thing to ask is for a better interface for studying but other than that awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Thank you for making it work on my TF700. I love developers who listen to paying customers and I will recommend this product to all of my colleagues. I would make a request if I may. I would like to be able to check a question as \"known\" after answering and reviewing without having to back out and click the ticker. That would make this app perfect for me in every way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Thanks for helping me pass
reviews.author: A Google User
